statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A'
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled' AND technician_id = 101;
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
